short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you to shop personalized skincare products based on your skin type and needs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SkincareMate analyzes skincare products while you shop online, instantly telling you if they're right for your skin. No more googling ingredients or wondering if a product might cause breakouts.

Key Features:
‚ú® Instant Product Analysis: Get immediate insights about any skincare product as you shop online
üéØ Personalized Recommendations: Receive custom match scores based on your unique skin profile
üö´ Ingredient Alerts: Instantly identify ingredients that might not work for your skin
üíæ Smart Shopping List: Save and compare products in your personal dashboard
üåê Works Everywhere: Compatible with major retailers like Sephora, Amazon, Ulta, and many more

What It Does:
- Analyzes ingredients automatically as you browse skincare products
- Shows you which ingredients might irritate your skin
- Gives each product a personalized match score based on your skin type
- Works on most shopping sites (Sephora, Amazon, Ulta, etc.)
- Saves products to compare later

Why Install:
- Stop wasting money on products that don't work for your skin
- Save hours of research time - get instant ingredient analysis
- Avoid ingredients that could cause irritation or breakouts
- Make confident purchases based on your specific skin needs
- Build a skincare routine that actually works for you

Simply install, set up your skin profile, and shop with confidence. SkincareMate works quietly in the background until you need it, helping you make smarter skincare decisions in seconds.

Visit skincaremate.com to learn more.
